subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: South Africa, New Zealand and Australia are all dealing with injuries after the just-concluded Super Rugby season, with the Springboks opting to rest many players during the upcoming Tri-Nations series.
snippet: South Africa, New Zealand and Australia are all dealing with injuries after the just-concluded Super Rugby season, with the Springboks opting to rest many players during the upcoming Tri-Nations series.
